answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Jitendra, 
Here are a few resources that you may find useful as you continue your job search. 
-This blog post oncareer advice for aspiring managers http://icma.org/en/BlogPost/254/Career_Advice_for_the_Aspiring_City_Manager
-This is an overview of almost all of ICMA's available career resources. http://icma.org/en/icma/career_network/career_resources
-This is the career resources topic page http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/32/Career_Resources
-This is the Professional Development topic page which will also offer some career development and resources http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/211/Professional_and_Personal_Development
I hope you find these resources useful as you continue your job search. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

answers.author: Jitendra Deshmukh
answers.text:
Thank you......i will check these. Since I am From Indiai donot know how much it will be helpful. I lost my chace of getting the job in US  when i was in last company Haworth as Asst Director when my interview was good.

author: Jitendra Deshmukh
text:
I was working for US MNC in Pune INDIA. Local Management decided to shift the Corporate office in another city which is 3000km away from Pune. So I asked local management for change of Company. But they have not provided to me any change of company. so I searched myself Indian Company and my decision is proving to be worst for me. Work environment is worst here. So i again started searching new job within 1 month. Could any one help me in getting new job in MNC in INDIA. I am in big trouble after joining this job.  
Requesting all of you to reply as early as possible.
Regards,
JItendra
title: In Search of Job
